sentences.sContent: It may be difficult to do at first. Don't let this discourage you.
sentences.sCn: 开始时做起来也许比较困难。不要让这个泄你的气。

sentences.sContent: ...In-class exams are believed to discourage cheating in exams...

remMethod.val: dis(消失掉) ＋ courage(精神) → 使精神消失掉 → 使泄气

words.tran: 使人沮丧的；令人气馁的
使人气馁地，使人沮丧地；阻止地
劝阻（discourage的过去分词）；使失去勇气

trans.tranOther: If someone or something discourages you, they cause you to lose your enthusiasm about your actions
